equipmentByType.notes: Chiller shall operate using R-513A refrigerant. Unit shall include twin screw compressors, direct expansion type evaporator, air-cooled condenser, and integral pump module.

specifications.specialFeatures: Unit mounted ultra low harmonic VFD (1 per compressor), suction shut-off service valve for each compressor, dual point power and unit controller, integral pump module with active/spare pumps and VFDs, dual point power connection, isolation valves on pump suction and discharge
